sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi zhùmíng de zuòjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est une écrivaine célèbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a famous writer.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zhǒng yào yǒu shénme zuòyòng?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel est l'effet de ce médicament ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What effect does this medicine have?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zuò zài nǐ de zuòwèi shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez vous asseoir à votre place.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please sit in your seat.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle porte une robe blanche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is wearing a white dress.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā bēizhe yī gè dà shūbāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il porte un grand sac à dos.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is carrying a big backpack.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À quelle heure commence le film ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What time does the movie start?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La santé du corps est la plus importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Physical health is the most important.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shēngbìng le, bùnéng lái shàngbān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est malade et ne peut pas venir travailler.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is sick and can't come to work.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime lire des romans.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to read novels.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā jīntiān de yàngzi hěn piàoliang.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a l'air très jolie aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She looks very pretty today.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Connais-tu la raison ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you know the reason?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut pratiquer davantage pour progresser.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You need to practice more to improve.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le rouge signifie danger.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Red represents danger.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu devrais te reposer un peu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should rest for a while.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Míngtiān yǒu kǎoshì, wǒ yào fùxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un examen demain, je dois réviser.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There's an exam tomorrow, I need to review.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants aiment regarder les animaux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children like to watch animals.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime écouter de la musique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to listen to music.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Alors c'était toi !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: So it was you!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ xiǎng hē chá huòzhě kāfēi?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veux-tu boire du thé ou du café ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Do you want to drink tea or coffee?

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La banque est en face du supermarché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The bank is opposite the supermarket.
